privacy.setLimitAdTracking.result: function f(ctx, params) {const ccs = ctx.get('privacySettings');console.log(`Set limitAdTracking params =>`, params);ccs.limitAdTracking = params && params.value;ctx.set('privacySettings', ccs, '123~A');console.log(`*** Updated the limitAdTracking value for ccs limitAdTracking ***`);return null;}
